column1: << ENCODING (must)  # Encording Type of Data File
<< SUBJECT COLUMN NUMBER (0-origin) | URI (*ID* is replaced with the value of specified column.)
<< DTYPE (optional)  # Data Type of Each Column (Empty means "string").
<< LANG (optional)  # Language of Each Column (Empty means "not specified".)
<< MULTI? (optional)  # Whether each column has multiple values. (0 : does not, other value : does)
<< ITEM_SEPARATOR (optional)  # The item separator in multi-value columns | Whether newline is added after it. (empty : do not include; other : include)
<< HIERARCHY (optional)  # If hierarchical structure is need to be described by empty nodes; specify the structure. The columns never specified are to be objects of the primary subject.
